industry: Health and Human Services and Insurance
description:
At Akkodis, we use our insight, knowledge, and global resources to make exceptional connections every day. With 60 branch offices located strategically throughout North America, we are positioned perfectly to deliver the industry’s top talent to each of our clients. Clients choose Akkodis as their workforce partner to solve staffing challenges that range from locating hard-to-find niche talent to completing quick-fill demands.
JOB TITLE: Financial Business Analyst EMPLOYMENT TYPE/DURATION: Contract (include duration and likelihood of extension)- 1 year – no extension. COMPENSATION: - Pay $40-$50/hour LOCATION DETAILS:Remote – West Coast only – hours are 8am-5pm PST (ability to come into the office quarterly)
Top 3-5 Technical Skills- 1. Financial BA with Workday software implementation experience a must. 2. ADP financial BA experience is a plus. 3. Managed Care experience highly desired 4. Project Scope/Detail- Transition and implementation from ADP to WorkDay solution
POSITION SUMMARY We are seeking a dynamic, energetic, people-process-technology-oriented business analyst with experience in Workday Finance. As the Workday Finance Business Analyst, you will play a role in the strategic development, enhancement, and support of our Workday Finance solutions. This role will help create Workday Finance solutions, provide operational support for our Workday Finance end users, and lead the delivery of Workday Finance solutions.
Responsibilities: 1. Serve as a liaison between the business, IT, and the Workday Finance team. 2. Gather the business requirements needed for system modifications, enhancements, and implementation of Workday Finance solutions. 3. Partner closely and develop strong relationships with ACCT / FIN and IT stakeholders. 4. Understand the function of all Workday Finance solutions, integrations, and how they are used by teammates. 5. Manage customer relationships and expectations by maintaining a communication process to keep others up to date on the project results. 6. Design and build reports, dashboards, etc. in Workday. 7. Perform and assist with testing of Workday Finance solutions. 8. Provide advisory support on business processes related to Workday Finance. 9. Discover and anticipate future needs and align Workday Finance to those needs. Summary of Qualifications: 1. 2yrs as a Workday or similar ERP Finance analyst 2. 2yrs of Workday or similar ERP report development 3. 2yrs of Workday implementation/support experience 4. Solid understanding of Workday Finance and Accounting capabilities 5. Strong analytical mindset with excellent problem-solving skills 6. Solid understanding of various financial business processes 7. Integration experience in enterprise application systems 8. Solid understanding of various financial business processes 9. Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams 10. Detail-oriented with strong organizational and product/project management skills 11. Familiarity with change management principles

If you are interested in this ,please click APPLY NOW. For other opportunities available at Akkodis go to www.akkodis.com. If you have questions about the position, please contact Dana More at dana.more@akkodisgroup.com '

Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled Benefit offerings include medical, dental, vision, term life insurance, short-term disability insurance, additional voluntary benefits, commuter benefits and 401K plan. Our program provides employees the flexibility to choose the type of coverage that meets their individual needs. Available paid leave may include Paid Sick Leave, where required by law; any other paid leave required by Federal, State, or local law; and Holiday pay upon meeting eligibility criteria. Disclaimer: These benefit offerings do not apply to client-recruited jobs and jobs which are direct hire to a client To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please visit https://www.modis.com/en-us/candidate-privacy/ The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.
